[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esengine/ecs-framework](./ecs-framework.md) &gt; [TypeSafeEventSystem](./ecs-framework.typesafeeventsystem.md)

## TypeSafeEventSystem class

类型安全的高性能事件系统 支持同步/异步事件、优先级、批处理等功能

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TypeSafeEventSystem 
```
